mapper.select: SELECT team.id as teamId, team_name as teamName, team_serial as teamSerial, status as status, klass.id as klassId, klass.grade as grade, leader_id as leaderId, student.student_name as leaderName FROM team, attendance, klass, student WHERE team.id = attendance.team_id AND attendance.klass_seminar_id = #{klassSeminarId} and team.klass_id = klass.id and team.leader_id = student.id
mapper.insert: insert team (klass_id, course_id, leader_id, team_name, team_serial, status) values (#{classId}, #{courseId}, #{leaderId}, #{teamName}, #{teamSerial}, #{status})
